main event: Multiple unidentified flying objects were observed over Altavista, Virginia on the night of October 9, 1966.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing up to 20 objects moving at high speeds without sound., One witness described an object the size of a basketball that glowed blue and made sharp turns., The sightings were noted to occur on several weekends leading up to the main observation date., The reports were made to the Air Force under Project Blue Book., Major Hector Quintanilla, Jr. acknowledged the witness's report despite insufficient data for follow-up.
sighted object: Unidentified flying objects, with one reported glowing blue object.
witness description: The witnesses included a local resident, Mrs. *****, and her daughter, both of whom reported detailed observations of the objects.
